name: 幾多の北
summary: Japan’s Koji Yamamura, already a renowned artist and animator, brings the international premiere of his feature debut, Dozens of Norths, to our 25th birthday edition of PÖFF. The experimental and existential hand drawn and painted piece, charts a dialogue-free voyage into an alien northern realm: it’s skeletal architecture and chilly inhabitants.
info:
• 中文名: 万千北方
  • 话数: 1
  • 导演: 山村浩二
  • 别名: Ikuta no kita
  • 别名: Dozen of Norths
  • 上映年度: 2021年11月
  • 片长: 64min
